name: places/ChIJs7RSltD3wokRwV8DZDXcsiY
formattedAddress: 54 Tiemann Pl, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 54 Tiemann Pl, New York, NY 10027-3305, USA

originalText.text: I took my dog here for the first time this weekend and I will definitely be back.  Alejandro and Jimena were extremely kind to me and my dog and made us feel very welcome in their space which, as many have said before, was very clean.  I normally like to keep my dog’s hair on the longer side (see the before photo) because I did not want him to have an overly manicured look; however, after seeing his amazing new cut and shorter length…I will continue to have him groomed like this.  I love it and his coat feels so soft.   What I also like about their business is it is just the two of them so you know there will be consistency.  At the last place he went for grooming, the staff was always changing so I could never get the same person nor the same style haircut.   I highly recommend Snoot Club!

originalText.text: I’m happily writing this review a week after my puppy, Teddy, got groomed at SnootClub. His blowout and haircut still look gorgeous and he still smells so incredible! From the moment I walked in, I felt an immediate sense of calm and community. They took time answering any questions I had and also took their time playing with Teddy in the little playpen before beginning the grooming session to ensure his comfort and happiness going into it. They spent A LOT of time and love on him as he was very matted on certain parts of his body, cries during a bath and isn’t the most cooperative with nail cutting. I appreciate their hard work and patience so much. Teddy was so happy upon pick-up. Their pricing was very friendly and fair. I seriously have zero complaints. In fact, I am just so happy to have found Teddy’s forever groomer. Our previous experiences at other places have either been bad or just mediocre. Snootclub grooming was a superior experience for me and most importantly my baby Teddy. Alejandro and Jimena were a dream team. Thank you! We can’t wait to go back!

originalText.text: Cannot recommend any more!! My Golden mix has never looked better than after her grooms here. She has sensitive skin and they are very gentle. She is very comfortable with them, you can just tell they treat your pets with care and respect. Also - best prices in the area!!

originalText.text:
Best grooming experience ever!
They are so great with Izzy getting her used to the area and being patient with her during her grooming (she gets a little nervous).
Owned and operated by such a nice couple we will for sure be back to support this small business with great costumer service.
My pup was so happy playing with them when I picked her up, she didn’t want to leave.
Pictures below- I don’t think I’ve ever seen her paws so white!

originalText.text: Fantastic experience! Our 1-year-old Spaniel is timid so I was concerned how she would react to a new grooming experience. However, the owners of this family run establishment were patient and kind with her. Our pup came smelling sweet and looking oh so lovely! Unlike other dog groomers, you feel the personal touch. Very reasonable prices, too! Thank you so much!!
